divs: sighting detailsi did not use my real name i dont trust nun.i was outside my barracks looking over my barracks when it flies over it for like 3 and halve minutes.it flew from left to right i mean like from one side of my barracks to the other slowly took off.i mean it took off so quick like a beam of light man.man [cms\tg\pd] what the hell was it?
